member.name: M:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.ASPxGrid.SearchRow(Column,Object,Boolean,Boolean,Boolean,Boolean,Boolean,Boolean,Boolean)

summary.para: Searches the specified column for a specific value based upon parameters passed.

member.param: A object representing a grid column whose values are to be searched.
A representing the search value of any type.
If true, both the search value and the processed value of the column being searched are converted to strings before comparing; if false, these values are compared as two objects.

If true, the search completes successfully when the beginning of a column cell value coincides with the search string; if false, the search succeeds only when a column cell value equals exactly the search string. This parameter affects the manner in which the search is performed only when the convertToString parameter is set to true or both the column data type and the val parameter type are the string type.

If true, the search is case-insensitive; if false, the search is case-sensitive. This parameter affects the manner in which the search is performed only when the convertToString parameter is set to true or both the column data type and the val parameter type are the string type.
If true, the search is performed in the forward direction; if false, it is performed in the backward direction.

If true, the search starts from the first row in the search area based upon the search direction; if false, it starts from the currently focused row. This parameter affects the manner in which the search is performed only when the findNext parameter is set to false.
If true, the search starts from a row next to the currently focused one to find more matches for a given search value; if false, the search starting position is specified by the restart parameter.
If true, the search cycles when it reaches the last or the first row based upon the search direction; if false, the search completes when it reaches the last row in the search area.
member.returns: A object representing the row found. Null (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no matches are found in the column.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.ASPxGrid.SearchRow(Column,Object,Row,Boolean,PartialSearchMode,Boolean,Boolean,Boolean,Boolean)

summary.para: Searches the specified column for a specific value based upon the parameters passed.

member.param: A object representing the grid's column whose values are to be searched.
A representing the search value, which can be of any type.
A object specifying the first row to search. The manner in which this parameter affects the search depends upon the findNext parameter's value.
If true, both the search value and the processed value of the column being searched are converted to strings before they are compared; if false, they are compared as two objects.
A enumeration value that specifies the position at which to look for the search string's value in a cell's contents.

If true, the search is case-insensitive; if false, the search is case-sensitive. This parameter affects the manner in which the search is performed only when the convertToString parameter is set to true or both the column's data type and the val parameter's type are of the string type.
If true, the search is performed in a forwards direction; if false, it's performed in a backwards direction.

If true, the search starts from the row next to the one passed via the startRow parameter to find more matches for a given search value; if false, the search's starting position is specified by the startRow parameter directly.
If true, the search cycles when it reaches the last or the first row based upon the search direction; if false, the search completes when it reaches the last row in the search area.
member.returns: A object representing the row found. Null (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no matches are found in the column.

summary.para: Fires after unsaved changes have been canceled.
Cancels all applied changes and switches the grid to mode.

Represents the CancelEditRow command name. The CancelEditRow command identifies the action which cancels changes made to a data row and raises the event. You can use the name of the CancelEditRow command to programmatically determine which action raised a postback and perform appropriate operations.

Represents the CancelNewRow command name. The CancelNewRow command identifies the action which cancels insertion a new data row and generates the event. You can use the name of the CancelNewRow command to programmatically determine which action raised a postback and perform appropriate operations.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.CorrectGroupItemBorders

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the grid automatically corrects the borders of grouping related elements.

member.value: true if the grid automatically corrects the borders of grouping-related elements; false if their borders aren't automatically corrected.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.DirectRender

summary.para: Determines whether internal WebControls are created for rendering the grid.

member.value: true if internal WebControls are not created for rendering the grid; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.DisableSelection

summary.para: Determines whether the browser selection is disabled.

member.value: true if the browser selection is disabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.FixGroupPanelWidth

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Group Panel is truncated to the width of the control.

member.value: true if the Group Panel is truncated to the width of the grid control; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.FixStatusBarWidth

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Status Bar is truncated to the width of the control.

member.value: true if the Status Bar contents are truncated to the width of the grid control; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.FlatStyle

summary.para: Determines whether the control is displayed using a flat style of drawing.

member.value: true if the control is displayed in the flat style; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.HotTrack

summary.para: Determines whether the Hot Track feature is enabled.

member.value: true if the Hot Track feature is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.InitializeDefStylesProps

summary.para: Determines whether style properties are automatically initialized by the grid.

member.value: true if style properties are automatically initialized by the grid; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.InstantiateTemplatesInButtons

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the contents of the templates defined for bar buttons are placed in a standard button element or rendered directly into a cell.

member.value: true if the button template should be instantiated in a button element; false, if it's instantiated directly in a cell.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.NativeScrolling

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying the manner in which the data displayed within the grid is scrolled.

member.value: true if native (HTML specific) scroll bars are used within the grid; false if the grid renders the scroll bars itself.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.RenderInSingleTable

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether all the grid items are rendered into the same table.

member.value: true if all the grid items are rendered as rows of the same table; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.ShowArrowsOnHeaderDragging

summary.para: Determines whether arrows are displayed when a column header is being dragged.

member.value: true if arrows are displayed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.ShowCellTooltips

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether tooltips are shown which display the full version of the contents for the grid's data cells which have truncated content.

member.value: A enumeration value specifying whether tooltips are displayed for the grid's data cells whose content is truncated.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.ShowEmptyPreview

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether preview sections are displayed within rows that contain empty values in the previewed data field.

member.value: true if empty preview sections are displayed within rows if the corresponding data field contains no data; false if empty preview sections are not displayed within rows.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.ShowEmptyRows

para.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty rows are shown.

member.value: true if empty rows are shown; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.ShowFocusedBorder

summary.para: Determines whether a border with a specified color and style is drawn around the focused row.

member.value: true if a border is drawn around the focused row; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.ShowSBCaptionsSeparator

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether a colon and blanks are used to separate captions from values within Status Bar sections.

member.value: true if a colon and blanks are displayed within Status Bar sections; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.LayoutOptions.TruncateRightSpaces

summary.para: Determines whether right spaces within data grid cells are truncated.

member.value: true if right spaces within data grid cells are truncated; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Specifies item types in the control.
An alternating data item within the control.
Defines a button bar within the control.
Identifies the edited item.
The footer section of the control.
A group item containing another group or data items as its children.
The Group Panel to which column headers should be dragged to perform grouping by column values.
The header section of the control.
A data item within the control.
An item used for displaying a row's Preview section in the grid.
A grid item containing all scrollable regions (including header item, data items, footer item and correponding scroll bars) when scrolling is available as specified by the property.
A search item used to display special controls within bound columns allowing the end user to search the columns for a specified value.

The white space displayed within the grid if the number of visible rows at the current moment is less than the property value. This may happen as a result of data navigation or group row collapse. The white space is displayed only if the option is active.
The status bar section of the control.
Used internally to support the ASPxGrid's infrastructure.
A grid item used to display a text string as a title above the grid's content.

A grid item containing a scrollable region when scrolling is available as specified by the property and native scrolling is not used (the option is set to false). In this case, a scrollable region includes data items only and does not contain header and footer items in contrast to the item.
Contains behavior settings of the control.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the BehaviorOptions class specifying its owner.

member.param: An IOptionsOwner supported object representing the owner of the created class instance.

summary.para: For internal use only.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.KeepWidth

summary.para: Gets or sets a value which specifies whether the grid's width can be changed by end users (by dragging columns' headers to resize them) at runtime.

member.value: true if the grid's width can be changed by end users; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.PostBackOnFocusedChanged

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the postback is generated each time focus shifts to another row within the current page.

member.value: true if the postback is generated each time focus shifts to another row within the current page; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.PostBackOnKeyPress

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether a postback should be generated when an end user presses a key while the grid has focus.

member.value: true if a postback is generated; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.PostBackOnRowDblClick

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a postback is generated when the end user clicks twice on a row.

member.value: true if a postback is generated; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.ShowLoadingText

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the text defined by the property is displayed as the section's value during round trips to the server.

member.value: true if a text message is displayed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.SynchronizeDataChanges

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the grid control is responsible for posting any changes made to its data to its data source.

member.value: true if the grid should post any data changes made; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.SynchronizeHeight

summary.para: Gets or sets a value which specifies whether the grid performs synchronization between the total height of grid elements (such as items) and the height value set for the grid control.

member.value: true if the grid control synchronizes its height; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.SynchronizeWidth

summary.para: Gets or sets a value which specifies whether the grid performs synchronization between the total width of grid elements (such as columns) and the width value set for the grid control.

member.value: true if the grid control synchronizes its width; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.UseExtendedGroupRowKeys

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying how grouping rows are identified within the grid.

member.value: true to construct a unique key value for each grouping row; false to identify a grouping row by its very first child data row's key value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.AllowAppend

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control allows new rows to be appended.

member.value: true if the control allows new rows to be appended; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.AllowDelete

para.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the control allows row deletions.

member.value: true, if the grid allows row deletions; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.AllowEdit

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the control allows editing data in its rows.

member.value: true, if the control allows you to edit data in its rows; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.AllowInsert

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control allows you to insert new rows.

member.value: true if the control allows you to insert new rows; otherwise false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.Assign(Options)

summary.para: Copies the settings of the specified object to the current object.

member.param: An -derived object representing the source of the operation. Identifies the object whose settings should be copied.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.AutoCollapse

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the collapses its grouping rows automatically when grouping is applied.

member.value: true if the control collapses its rows automatically due to data grouping operations; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.AutoDataSourceChanging

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the grid control should change information in the data source automatically.

member.value: true if automatic data source changing is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.AutoEdit

summary.para: Gets or sets a value which specifies whether the values of external bound controls are allowed to be modified immediately after the page load and that the grid control will automatically switch to edit mode when a user starts modifying the value of one.

member.value: true if the grid automatically switches to edit mode when an attempt to edit the value of any bound control is made; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.AutoExpand

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control expands all its grouping rows when grouping is applied.

member.value: true if the control expands all its grouping rows automatically due to data grouping operations; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.AutoIncrementKeyField

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the key field value is incremented automatically when new rows are added to the grid control.

member.value: true if a new row's key field value increments automatically; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.AutoSorting

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the ASPxGrid sorts its data automatically or whether manual sorting can be applied.

member.value: true if the grid control sorts its data automatically; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.CancelChanges

para.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the changes made by the end user are canceled if he does not confirm them manually.

member.value: true if changes are canceled; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.CaseSensitiveSorting

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the sorting feature is case sensitive.

member.value: true if the sorting feature is case sensitive, otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.CellSelection

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether individual cells can be selected within the focused row.

member.value: true if individual data cells can be selected within the focused row; false if only the entire focused row can be selected.

summary.para: Sets all Boolean option values to false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.ClientSideExpanding

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether expansion/collapse of group rows are carried out without generating a postback.

member.value: true if client side expansion/collapse is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxGrid.BehaviorOptions.ClientSideInitialization

summary.para: Specifies the vertical position of grid elements.

para.para: Indicates that a grid element is displayed at the bottom of the grid.
Indicates that a grid element is displayed at the top of the grid.

summary.para: Lists the values specifying the Status Bar types available in the .

para.para: Represents a Status Bar of the Custom type. The Status Bar of this type does not contain a predefined set of sections. You should manually add Status Bar Sections to it via the property.
Represents a Status Bar of the Regular type. The Status Bar of this type, by default, contains a predefined set of sections. However, you can add any arbitrary Status Bar Sections to it.

summary.para: Specifies the type of the sections displayed within the Status Bars of the .

para.para: Displays custom data. A section of this type has no default caption and automatically calculated value, therefore its caption and value should be specified via the and properties.

summary.para: Displays the number of pages within the grid control. The number of pages depends on the page size and the number of rows within the grid. The page size is specified via the property. The number of rows is returned via the property.

para.para: Displays the index of the current page.
Displays the number of records in the bound data source.
Displays any custom status information. The section display text can be changed via the property.

Displays the total number of rows returned by the property. When grouping is applied to the control, the total number of rows is the number of data rows plus the number of group rows. When grouping is not applied to the grid, the total number of rows is equal to the number of records within the bound data source.

Displays the number of visible rows. When grouping is applied to the control, visible rows are those which are not hidden within collapsed parent rows. When grouping is not applied to the grid, the number of visible rows is equal to the total number of rows.
Displays indexes of the first and the last rows visible on the current grid page.

summary.para: Lists the values specifying the Button Bar types availble in the .

para.para: Represents the Custom bar. The Button Bar of this type does not contain a predefined set of buttons. You should manually add Bar Buttons to it via the property.
The screenshot above shows the bar containing three buttons: , and .

Represents the Navigator bar. The Button Bar of this type, by default, contains a predefined set of buttons used to navigate through grid rows and manipulate grid data. However, you can add any arbitrary Bar Buttons to it.

Represents the Pager bar. The Button Bar of this type, by default, contains a predefined set of buttons used to perform advanced navigation in a page-by-page manner. However, you can add any arbitrary Bar Buttons to it.

summary.para: Specifies the values which indicate whether the row and cell borders of the control are joined in a single border or detached as in standard HTML.
Borders are collapsed, where adjacent, into a single border.
The behavior of borders depends upon the property's setting. If this property is set to true borders are collapsed into a single border; otherwise, they are detached.
Borders are detached (standard HTML).
Lists the values specifying bar types available in the .

para.para: Represents the Button Bar which contains a number of buttons and is used to navigate through the grid, manipulate data in the bound dataset and perform other operations.
Represents the Status Bar which provides users with status and miscellaneous information about the grid control and the bound dataset.

summary.para: Specifies the type of buttons displayed within the Button Bars of the .

para.para: Represents the AppendRow button which appends a new row after the last grid row and make it available for editing. To complete row appending, the Ok button should be clicked after new row editing is finished.
Represents the Cancel button which cancels the changes made.

summary.para: Represents the compound ChangePageSize button which is comprised of an editor element and a button element and allows end users to change the number of rows displayed within the grid.

para.para: Represents the Custom button which can be used to perform some custom operations. Use the event handler to process the Custom button click.
Represents the DeleteRow button which deletes the focused row from the grid. The event should be handled to apply the deletion to the bound data source.
Represents the EditRow button which switches the current row to edit mode.
Represents the compound GoToPage button which is comprised of an editor element and a button element and allows end users to move to a specific page within the grid control.

Represents the InsertRow button which inserts a new row before the focused one and makes it available for editing. To complete row inserting, the Ok button should be clicked after new row editing is finished.
Represents the MoveFirst button which moves focus to the first visible row within the grid's collection.
Represents the MoveLast button which moves focus to the last visible row within the grid's collection.
Represents the MoveNext button which moves focus to the next visible row within the collection.
Represents the MoveNextPage button which moves focus forward by the number of visible rows specified via the property.
Represents the MovePrev button which moves focus to the previous visible row within the collection.
Represents the MovePrevPage button which moves focus backward by the number of visible rows specified via the property.
Represents the Ok button which posts the changes made. The event should be handled to apply the changes to the bound data source.

para.PARA: Represents the compound button which is comprised of a number of buttons. Each button displays the index of the page in the grid and allows end users to navigate to the corresponding page.

para.para: Represents the Refresh button which reloads the associated data.

Represents the compound Search button which is comprised of a drop down list element, an editor element and a button element. The button allows end users to search a selected grid column for the specified value.

summary.para: Represents the SelectPage combo box which contains a list of available pages and allows end users to navigate to a particular page in the grid.
Provides data for the grid's events that relate to the update operation being initiated.

For client-side mode, corresponds to the Vertical value; for server-side mode - to the None value.
Both horizontal and vertical scroll bars are shown when necessary (see the descriptions of the Horizontal and Vertical values for more details).

The horizontal scroll bar is shown when the sum of all the widths of the visible grid columns exceeds the width specified for the grid control. Selecting this value disables the width synchronizing feature controlled by the option.
No scroll bars are shown.

The vertical scroll bar is shown when either the grid's page size or the grid's height is specified and the grid cannot display all its rows at once as a result. Selecting this value disables the height synchronizing feature controlled by the option.
Represents a method that will handle the and event of the grid control.
